section.title:
tax zones
master list of Tax Zones
section.para: Tax zones are geographic areas that have a specific tax jurisdiction and tax assignment. Tax assignments are assigned on a tax zone and tax type basis to determine what tax structure to apply to a given item. To access the master list of tax zones, go to Accounting > Tax > Tax Zones. The following screen will appear:
The Tax Zones screen displays information on all existing tax zones, including tax zone area and tax zone description.
